body_html:
@traveller59
-removed MSVC, Cuda9
-Installed MSVC community 2017 with 14.11 toolset. Installed Cuda 9 with visual studio integration
-changed the line to: call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11 as you suggested

Works like a charm! thanks

body:
@traveller59 
-removed MSVC, Cuda9
-Installed MSVC community 2017 with 14.11 toolset. Installed Cuda 9 with visual studio integration
-changed the line to: call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64 -vcvars_ver=14.11 as you suggested

Works like a charm! thanks
